Class BasicReporterImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.vrom.roo.validator.core.impl.BasicReporterImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Reporter

    public class BasicReporterImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements Reporter
    This class is responsible for validating the contents of an inputstream using the defined reporting implementations
